channel.title: Please help!
channel.description:
hey guys,
I've just download TrisidiaX V3 and i've a problem.
I've did this: server = "127.0.0.1" and the next one too, but when i run the client it says this error:
" Unable to load/download the cache"
I would appreciate your help.
Add me on skype: trilogy_jwz

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

ultimatepkvillage:

it has a broken cache link.

Thanks genius. You’ve diagnosed the problem, now offer a solution.

OP, as he said, the link to the cache has gone bad (404’d). You will need to locate (or make) a valid direct link to the cache to download.

Direct link means that if you were to put it in the address bar, it would start downloading as soon as it loaded the “page”.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:

it has a broken cache link.
